author: Matt Wolfe
description:
Here’s the TLDR on AWS re:Invent 2025:

🔥 AI Infrastructure Is Leveling Up: AWS is investing HUGE in NVIDIA-powered UltraServers and training frontier models.
🔧 Everyone Wants a Custom AI Model: Companies want AI that actually understands their business, and big tech is responding to the demand. AWS dropped Nova Forge for building custom frontier models, new systems for fine-tuning, and serverless customization through SageMaker AI.
🤖 AI Agents Are Going Enterprise: AgentCore now gives teams a full platform for deploying agents safely at scale, with built-in policy controls, quality evaluation, episodic memory, and Nova Act for UI automation.

If you want to know where AI is heading in 2026, this is it: bigger chips, smarter customization, and safer AI agents.

#ainews #ai #aws #amazon
title: The Biggest AI Bombshells From AWS re:Invent
